title: NEW LOW PRICES! Updated Homes In Pet Friendly Community! Tour Now!!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1093 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Settle in Style!', 'Your Home Your Canvas.', 'Featuring a new expanded fitness center, business center w/ WiFi lounge, redesigned clubroom and beautifully refinished homes!', 'Apartment Living : Evolved.', "At the hub of everything haute and hip in Southeast Denver you'll find Legend Oaks Apartments, where an evolution in apartment living is emerging.", "Here you can walk to Havana Street's fun and funky shopping, eateries and events.", "Bike to Cherry Creek's abundant recreation and parks, or spend the day there boutique-browsing and gallery-hopping.", "This prime location offers easy access to I-225 and is minutes from downtown, Denver Tech Center, Children's Hospital Colorado and DIA.", "Then come home to Legend Oaks' evolving collection of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, completely redesigned to complement today's lifestyle.", "Here you'll find beautifully refinished homes: All-new kitchens with new cabinets, countertops and clean steel appliances.", 'Nine-foot ceilings with crown molding, chic updated lighting, fresh wall colors and a cozy gas fireplace.', 'And of course, your must-have conveniences such as a full-size washer/dryer, private garage and plentiful storage.', 'Close to I-25, Close to I-225, Cherry Creek Schools, Cherry Creek Challenge School, RTD 83L, RTD 11, RTD 120, RTD light rail, Close to light rail, Gardens on Havana, Close to CU Hospital, Close to Anschutz Medical Campus, Close to Buckley Air Force Base, Close to Cherry Creek, Close to DTC, Cherry Creek Reservoir, Cherry Creek State Park, Highline Canal Trail', 'Features:', 'Bedroom access to patio*, Private patio / balcony with storage, Refinished bathrooms with large oval tubs*, Built-in shelving*, Twin basin vanities*, Clean steel & black appliances, 9 foot ceilings with crown molding, Full size washer / dryer included, Open floorplans, Kitchen pantry*, Cozy gas fireplaces*, Espresso cabinetry, Central heat and AC, Remodeled interiors, Window coverings, Large walk-in closets, Chic lighting & wall colors', '*Select Apartment Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Private detached garages available, Electronic payments accepted, Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply), Cherry Creek School District, Off-leash dog park, Year-round resort style pool, Mature landscaping, Relaxing spa, Picnic gazebo & BBQ area, Gated entry after hours, Newly remodeled fitness center, Newly remodeled business center with free wi-fi', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly!', 'Call for breed restrictions!', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'G26NbyB0KPv']
